name: Re:Time
description:
Re:Time is a 3D FPS with the abilities to Slow Down and Rewind Time at will

Fight your way through the Levels to Reach the end goal, utilizing your time controlling abilities to your advantage in combat!

Notes

Re:Time may get updates! Find out what Version you're playing on by looking at the Bottom left on the Main Menu.

Feedback Welcome in the Comments.

Beware this is my first 3D game and not very good but it's kinda cool ig lol 

Install Instructions

➤Download the Zip File Below

➤Open the File and Right click to Extract Files

➤Open the Extracted Files

➤Double Click on First 3D Game.exe

➤lol that's it. enjoy :0
